Test pagination line 1.
Test pagination line 2.
Test pagination line 3.

Test pagination line 4.
Test pagination line 5.
Test pagination line 6.
Test pagination line 7.
Mm-hmm.
The power you are looking for is still waiting for you in the sea of chaos.
Don't be surprised when you see this sentence. I'm testing random lines!
Is it time to fish, human?
What do you mean, you seem to have seen me in other worlds?
Hum, no comment.
Boss sent me to keep watch.
If there is anything unusual in the sea of chaos, I will inform everyone immediately.
Hmm... is that device a "vending machine"?
I don't know if there is any wine...
Hello.
Good morning.
Good afternoon.
Good evening.
Have a nice day.
Are you out for a walk, too?
If you don't mind, we can keep each other company.
The fine weather heralded a bumper harvest, and I had a hunch…
Today, Voyage's fishing boats will definitely return home with a full load!
The gentle sea breeze is really comfortable, which reminds me...
The time spent with Faycal in The Hill of Convallaria, waiting for the return of Boss.
But I believe that as long as there is a reliable head of the team…
It will certainly become a beautiful place like The Hill of Convallaria.
Here are my most important friends and relatives…
So this is my home and the place I want to guard.
Leader, you will always be with everyone!
It seems like a coincidence. I'm looking for a drinker.
If there is nothing wrong, just sit down and have a drink together.
Ha! You really are reliable.
I knew, when you took over the Sword of Convallaria, that you were something special.
The three of us will always thank you for the opportunity to meet again in Elysium.
Yo, my body is much stronger than before Voyage last time.
I can feel more at ease when I give you the little guys.
Ha ha ha, don't get me wrong, I'm not leaving alone.
I just hope that even if I am gone, you can protect yourself.
... What can I do for you?
Don't follow me, we're fine enough to walk together.
In order to help Maitha, I am willing to return to such a dangerous place...
You have a little courage as a guy.
... Come back... well... have a good rest first...
Don't get me wrong... They said that you just came back from a dangerous place...
I'm here to express my condolences on their behalf!
Do you want Voyage again?
Needless to say... I'll take on the guard work in Elysium.
I'll keep this place for you until you come back from there.
Sea of Chaos… How did I even end up here?
Can't wrap my head around it… Whatever, everybody's here anyway.
How I miss Vltar Mountain, those days of falcons chasing deer…
Back then, my sister used to praise me as a good helper.
Right, I've got to hustle here and show everyone the value of me, the Gray Wolf!
Leader! Can I join the voyage?
I'm good at recon, battle, trap placing… you name it!
Thought I was dreaming…
I never knew there'd actually be a place where you could just bask in the sun and live.
Don't count on me for hard labor, though…
I don't work for free.
I was wondering how long this paradise can last…
As long as Elysium exists, I can live a carefree life, eat and drink my fill…
All thanks to your perseverance, good Leader.
It's surprisingly peaceful here, but we mustn't let our guard down!
Even a single Calamity could throw Elysium into chaos!
Eighty laps around Elysium for warm-up training are complete!
Muscle, tactics, and stamina training are complete!
Hey, Leader, up for training together tomorrow?
Seeing you protect Elysium rekindles my old faith!
Leader, let me lend a hand, too!
There must be some specific rules for the existence of this world…
Once I find the way, I'll surely grasp the rules of running this world.
I don't obey commands or become anyone's puppet.
I can't, and of course… I don't have to.
The world before you may not be as bleak as it seems.
True strength never doubts its abilities.
May the light… shield this land from harm.
May Elysium be the true haven for the lost…
No matter where I am…
Healing the world shall always be my mission.
Here's hoping I can lend my strength to this land.
I've fought for faith, and ensnared in agony for it…
But thankfully, I've kept my resolve, and never strayed from my path…
At last, I can reclaim my authentic self, and my genuine duty…
No longer lost in the so-called "greater good"…
Thank you for being there for me.
It's heartening to see everyone living a happy and peaceful life here.
No one will be displaced by war, nor oppressed by violence and tyranny.
Elysium, brimming with laughter and vitality… that's where we long to be.
Let's work together to make this place even more beautiful, Leader!
No matter what challenges arise, I'll do whatever I can to help everyone…
I'm super grateful for everyone's trust in me!
With water and sunlight, plants can thrive energetically…
Leader, don't you feel their power?
This garden would be perfect with a pine tree planted in it.
Who should I consult about such matters?
Battling through half my life, I never thought I'd end up in a place like this.
Elysium is truly living up to its name.
You've got this place running like clockwork.
Hahaha, it's high time this world was passed on to the young blood.
Maybe it's just old age…
I often reminisce about the times with Faris on the battlefield.
Just let me stay here alone…
Hmm… this is nice…
Why do people like to get together…
Hmm… too noisy for me… I don't like it…
The one I want to keep tabs on… is right here in front of me…
Mmm… it feels good…
What lies ahead in Elysium tomorrow?
Um... I'm looking forward to it…
Seeing you… somehow makes everything brighter…
It's magical. Is this… happiness?
Any instructions for me?
If there's nothing pressing, allow me to bask in solitude for a while.
What can I do for you?
Outside opinions and others seldom bother me.
Silently guarding everything there is where my duty lies…
I… am not afraid of unfamiliar surroundings… absolutely!
After all, there are plenty of tasty treats here…
Huh? Did you… hear what I said?
Everyone seems so welcoming…
Hmm… I need to step up and make more friends, too!
Those important words, I reserve only for someone special.
It's… it's nothing… Would you like to take a walk with me?
Sneaking a quick break, I hope no one's onto me.
Um… don't spill the beans to my brother, please?
Keep going! You can do this!
Leader, these ants seem to be carrying some really heavy stuff!
Should we whip up something to help these little fellows?
Leader, I've got a burning question, super important!
Ever wonder how many fish lurk in these dark waters?
Oops, my bang-bang experiment flopped again.
Hmm, gotta keep hustling and make Elysium proud!
Sneaking out for fun, huh?
That won't do! Count me in!
Ease off on the prying eyes. There's nothing you're after here.
…I struggle to grasp this world.
Yet, I'm curious about… where your choices lead.
Caught a glimpse of my past?
Humph, I have no regrets about those tries…
It had to be done to bring peace to Iria.
No matter who holds the reins in Iria…
As long as it brings peace to the people, that's all we need.
Well, well, if it isn't our esteemed and adorable Leader!
Why aren't you out with those noisy fools today?
Tsk, what a dull place.
If it weren't for you walking around…
I'd think this whole Elysium was packed with Dummies!
Turns out… I am the stupid clown forsaken by faith.
Hey, why are you staring at me like that? Are you trying to make me…
Forget it. I… just need some time alone…
Embrace… the real me?
Even without a goal to pursue, I'll keep on.
Vltar Mountain… Which way is it?
My people… are they okay?
Wherever we wander, choices always linger.
And we must accept responsibility for our wrong choices.
Clinging to yesterday squanders today and punishes tomorrow.
Maybe it's time… time to break free from memories.
Back at Vltar Mountain, I'd often do the same…
Gazing from the watchtower, waiting for Nono's return.
Back from the Sea of Chaos?
If you'll trust me, let me join your next venture.
I'll guard you with my bow and arrows.
Uphold justice, eradicate injustice.
In this tranquil land, can I still find purpose in my duty?
At times, choosing hurts more than having none to choose.
Staying true to oneself… is it the right choice?
See the lush green beneath the blooming flowers?
Hmm… I'm starting to see the beauty of Elysium.
I'll protect this home, this beauty, with all that I've got.
Grilled fish… is really tasty.
Leader, want a bite? I've saved some for you.
I want to thank you for all your understanding and help.
Soft fur, pink paw pads, Col loves it.
Huh? Where did the Mysterious Cat go?
Plants thrive in the sunshine…
Hmm… so does Col.
Miguel said, share what you love with those you care about.
This sweet treat, Col… wants to share it with you.
Those monsters outside are terrifying…
Col… wants to help… fight them with you!
Miguel said Col's improving!
I'm getting ready for strength training. Want to join?
Behold the might of our Luccian physique, our pride and glory!
Master Agata has long since stressed the importance of tactical strategy to me…
But to be honest, before I ran into you…
I never faced a challenge where strength alone didn't cut it…
You've been occupied for… who knows how long.
If there's anything I can do to help, I'm all ears!
The Calamities have been stirring more restlessly of late.
Take me along, and I'll show you what I'm made of!
Where in the Sea of Chaos is Iria located?
And now, what will it be like?
Ah, Leader, it's you… Thanks for everything.
Well, adapting to life here is my current quest.
Leader, I'm doing my best to study the Sea of Chaos…
After all… Elysium's destiny is ours, intertwined with each of us!
The longer I stay, the more I can't help but hope…
All those grand visions of a vibrant Iria could come true.
Our worn-out homeland reborn, hope in every heart.
I think… there's no happier moment than now.
I'm aging, not as strong as before…
Your pursuit of ideals fills me with… envy and admiration.
Lately, Your Excellency seems burdened…
Please, take care and let me handle things.
I just created a new dish, and Gloria adores it.
Would you be interested in having a taste?
Thanks to Your Excellency, I can reunite with Gloria here.
Haha, as long as she's happy, that's all I need.
Had I not made that mistake back then…
Maybe then, I could've saved our tribe. I must've let my sister down…
Vltar's mountain breeze and moonlight were breathtaking…
Sadly, I failed to protect it.
Goodbyes hold sadness, yet usher in new hope…
Mutual understanding among friends is… rare.
Thanks for your understanding and patience…
I crafted a new tune…
Do you have a moment? I want you to hear it first.
This slow life… I'm not quite used to it.
Time to revamp the Hanged Men's training.
Those Calamities? Not as tough as they seem.
No fancy skills or tactical training…
Just brainless monsters causing chaos.
Well, weeds never cease to sprout, do they?
Fear not, with me by your side, those weeds won't touch you!
Don't charge in unless you're fully ready and sure!
I sure don't want to see you get hurt over this…
Sascha…
She… she's… waiting for me…
Fight… I need to fight…
For… my daughter, fight on…
As long as I'm in the fight, there's hope…
I'm begging you! Let me fight, please!
This isn't where I belong…
Are you… here to help me find my daughter?
Playing house with old enemies…
Humph, is there anywhere more ludicrous than Elysium?
Need a reminder, Leader?
You shouldn't be curious about me.
Is peeping at others your special hobby?
Cut that look. I don't need your pity.
Even if you dig into my heart, uncover my past…
You'll never fathom… not that I'm asking you to.
Looks like everyone here thinks highly of you.
Our Leader's even more reliable than we thought, isn't it?
Done so much, yet uncertain if it's right.
You must feel that way too sometimes, right?
Reality's like a chessboard, no room for hesitation or regret.
So, every move forward must be made with no regrets.
The Hanged Men's duty is to complete missions at any cost.
The commander, too, is just fulfilling a trade-off at the cost of lives.
But I wonder… What's your take on this deal?
This place breeds complacency…
Shouldn't we… blame you for that?
Do you also crave to reshape the world? Then brace yourself to risk it all.
Humph, don't expect me to join your madness…
After all, your squad still needs someone level-headed.
Shh… Beryl says loud talk invites Calamities.
Leader, remember to speak softly in Elysium…
Take me to the Sea of Chaos more often, Leader!
Um, it's actually because…
Faycal and I made a bet—whoever catches fewer Calamities is the coward!
It's so quiet here.
Silence always brings back memories…
Leader, I noticed you've been quiet lately…
Heavy hearts lead to restless nights, you know.
Stop daydreaming. Let me tell you a story!
Maitha and the others are still calling you "Leader." Strange…
Considering there is no mercenary group or need for money in Elysium…
Why are they still willing to follow you?
After all these years, who would've guessed I'd be schooled by a cat?
But I'm no cat. Just waltzing up to people might set off alarms, huh?
"Honesty makes for good company"… does it?
Perhaps I chose you because your honesty resonated with me, deep down.
I just couldn't admit it outright back then.
Can you believe someone's actually worried I'll tumble into the Sea of Chaos?
Not happening, I assure you.
The smell of Calamity… is unique.
Could make some top-notch incense, maybe.
I've been sensing those distant stares lately, quite intriguing.
Time to stretch these limbs.
Parrots will keep an eye on the Sea of Chaos,
as long as we keep the treats coming.
Rooftop view's nice, perfect for a breather.
Just a bit too crowded.
Shh… hear that? They're scheming something there…
You wonder who? The little Mysterious Cat and parrots, of course.
They've been hanging out together lately, quite the sight to see. I better listen in.
Goli's stuck in the vending machine again, typical…
Will you feel lonely for… walking alone?
If you wish, I'll be here to keep you company.
You seem… utterly exhausted.
Struggling through your work… it invites mistakes, you see?
Without focus, you could be vulnerable to disguised foes…
Ah, I forgot to mention… this is my forte, indeed.
Dance moves can be used to confuse enemies… yet also to convey heartfelt emotions.
Life's journey offers few chances to reclaim one's heart.
Thanks to you, I shall no longer have to dance with fake politeness and compliance…
Perhaps, this marks a fresh start.
It's time to move on…
The path of sacrifice and sin won't bring forth hope…
Here… away from the tumult of power…
My heart is so clear and peaceful now, as never before.
There will always be someone like you…
who devotes wholeheartedly to reshaping the fate of the world.
The Sea of Chaos is like a boundless treasury of history.
To witness those histories is truly an unimaginable experience!
I enjoy feeling the tranquil and free breeze at the docks…
But I still miss Iria…
That land is home to great people and beautiful landscapes.
My friend, are you coming to the history class today?
Haha, I've prepared a very exciting historical story.
A moving story…
That connects the past and the present and resonates emotionally with listeners…
I will be the recorder and narrator of the story.
I get used to the survival games on the snowfields…
It's not bad to rest in such a place occasionally.
Haha, Leader of Elysium, you've kept this place in great order!
Let's exchange experience when you get the time.
Elysium is lucky to have such a charismatic leader like you…
The days ahead seem like they will be interesting.
Little one, tell me about any troubles you have!
Perhaps I can help you resolve them.
Everyone in The Town of Convallaria... I don't know what's going on now...
I hope Maitha in that world can fulfill its mission and protect the safety of the town!
Without the Boss, Faycal and I might have died long ago.
I'm willing to do anything to keep her safe!
It's time for dinner, and it's clearly prepared its favorite canned food...
But I don't know where this guy is fooling around again!
Meow meow-come out quickly!
I'm sorry. I was gazing into the distance, lost in thought.
Do you want to know what's on my mind, Captain? I'm just thinking…
The peace and beauty of Elysium are hard to come by. Thanks to the efforts of the head of the delegation and everyone!
Hey--whew!
I haven't had strength training for a long time, head of the team, look...
Isn't that turf over there very suitable for training ground?
Maitha, she... obviously suffered the same disaster as me at that time...
But it is always clear like a little sun.
Well... it's perfect for her to do what inspires everyone.
And I just need to guard them silently from behind.
There are monsters everywhere, and it is not as safe as imagined.
Maybe one day we will face the choices we once faced at that time...
But I must not allow the nightmare of the Boss leaving to come true again!
Looking at it a few times, I still think that cat is too strange...
It's really unpleasant to always show an expression that you know everything!
The only advantage is that... the hair feels good...
I must become stronger and train diligently...
Only in this way can we be fully prepared before the crisis comes.
Boss is secretly preparing something without telling me and Maitha…
Won't let us know about any trouble...
How can we make her realize that... we are not the weak children in those days.
Haha, there are little guys around me...
It's a good feeling even to hear them arguing.
I just don't know how long days like this can last...
The little guys don't know what kind of crisis they will face next.
But... they are no longer the children who shrank at that time.
Even if I'm gone one day, they can take on the responsibility of guarding this place for you.
I didn't expect the little guys to settle down in such a beautiful place...
Haha, it would be even better if the tavern of the town was here.
Is our home on the other side of the sea?
From here... I can't see it.
I hope that land will never be defiled.
Instead of sighing about the crisis that has not yet arrived...
It is better to drink a few glasses of freshly brewed osmanthus wine first.
After all, a challenging future is interesting, isn't it?
Yesterday, Boss talked in her sleep.
Hmm... in my dreams, I am chanting my own fine wines in tavern, The Town of Convallaria...
I wish I could open a tavern for Boss here.
That annoying cat refused without even hearing me out about the tavern…
And kept shouting that I might as well open a canning workshop.
Hee hee, I did say yes.
But... I'm not that easy to compromise.
Canning workshop?
Shh... Let me tell you a secret, the tavern's blueprint is ready...
Faycal and I are currently preparing building resources.
Hehe, of course, it is allowed by kittens!
After all, I named the tavern "Canned Food Workshop"!
What are these stones used for? I don't mind telling you.
Boss' weapon has long been worn out.
I'm going to make her a big stone sword.
Stop staring at me. Not everyone has a part in this.
The stone sword mentioned last time...
Hmm... Boss doesn't seem to like it very much, and she is still a little angry…
After all, this is the first time I have seen a weapon that Boss can't lift…
If only it could be transformed into something else.
Those tools and materials... thank you...
I have made other things out of the materials left over from Boss' weapons.
It's the ship parked on the dock.
Well, it's for Boss and Maitha.
If those monsters invade Elysium again, they can leave here first.
Haha, the sound of turning over things is too loud, which affects you.
Strange, it was clearly put on my body... didn't it come back from there?
If the little guys knew that it was missing, they would be very sad.
The last time I lost things, I have plastered notices on Elysium…
Sure enough, in the end, we have to trouble everyone to find it together.
That is a photo at the beginning of the founding of the Sword of Convallaria...
It's a memory that little guys and I can never forget.
That photo was not found in the end, but thank you for your help...
The little guys have made a new picture for me.
That's a group photo of the three of us when we first came to Elysium.
Although it will be a pity to lose old things, I will keep these memories in my heart forever.
Alas, Leader, indeed as expected, cloudy days will make people feel bad.
Maitha's wish... it is not easy to realize it!
You said Maitha seemed unhappy?
Did she mention her wish to you...?
However, it seems that she never made any request to us...
Well, whatever it is, I will try my best to find it!
Maitha's wish? Does this little guy finally know how to express his preferences?
Faycal and I are by her side now, and her wishes seem to...
Ha ha, it's really a bit hard to guess.
Ah, why did you ask me about Maitha's wishes?
Do I seem to have a good relationship with that little girl?!
Don't ask me to know... her wish must be easy to realize Meow.
Ah, Leader, Faycal and Boss suddenly asked me to find them.
Say there is something you want to give me. Maitha can't walk with you!
Ah! It's another cloudy day...
You ask me about my wishes? You can't achieve this...
What Maitha wants... is warm sunshine and sunny days.
Hmm? I'm sorry I bumped into you...
I have something to do... well... nothing special, I'll go first.
Why does this guy Faycal make his clothes so dirty every day...
The socks were worn out, the cuffs were covered with mud, and even one shoe was lost.
Ask him, he faltered and refused to say, and he must be trying to be brave behind our backs again.
Leader, the task of inquiring about the situation is given to you, please, please!
You're not waiting for me here, are you?
Don't try to pry into what I've been up to lately... I won't tell you.
Don't get me wrong... I have to go first!
Leader, under my unremitting tracking...
I found the clue of Faycal's shoe loss.
It's that smelly cat... it's pressing Faycal to work!
That's right, Maitha will take you with him and find out about it!
Faycal works for me. That's right.
I paid him absolutely reasonably, without any intention of exploitation !
Next time you're in Voyage, I promised to save him a seat on the boat.
Don't doubt me! It's as simple as that.
That boy thinks he can help you.
Haha, you're back.
I'm going to the cat's. Let's go!
You don't know, that cat is doing divination research recently.
It is said that we can calculate how many deaths we will experience in future stories.
Haha, it sounds amazing.
Are you here to question me about divination?
Hum! I have to earn some money to support myself.
Meow, lest you threaten me again!
Did the Boss run to divination?
She completely keep Faycal and I in the dark. She must be afraid that we will worry.
Hey hey, head of the regiment... remember to tell Maitha if there is any special situation!
About divination?
It's zero times, so the next two little guys can rest assured.
That guy told me all the things I had experienced in the past right at once!
I didn't expect this cat to be quite powerful.
Haha, if you are excited, you can try it.
What! You also want to do divination?!
Don't even think about it, if you know the future...
Hum! Then I would be out of job!
Did you see the past of Safiyyah and the others as the Hanged Men this time?
I heard that you and Safiyyah used to…
Haha, that's quite the cursed fate; could talk about it for days and nights.
I'll definitely have a good chat with you about what happened back then. Look forward to it!
I've seen those... tactics of the Hanged Men.
They fought to protect the interests of Iria, but what they did was…
I'm also a bit confused about what the Hanged Men really are…
Nergal and Nungal, they're about the same age as me.
Seeing the sacrifices they've made…
Ah, this really doesn't feel good!
Auguste... Auguste…
Isn't he the big bad guy? Are we really going to delve into his past?
So... that's it?
Uh... No! You can't stop until we've collected the Tarot of that world!
Humans, oh humans, what's the use of running away?
What's your sage advice, Professor Paws?
Hmph... Did you see what Auguste looked like in that world?
Running away will only lead to the cruelest of realities catching up in the end.
This Auguste, he's totally a madman, right?!
You better not bring that kind of person to Elysium!
This... doesn't seem to be entirely under my control…
So that's how sister Samantha became a Judge…
Even though sister Samantha has changed a lot over the years,
her kindness hasn't changed a bit.
Maybe it's because she has a past of being saved, so she wants to save more people.
Did you see that experience Samantha went through? It was hair-raising.
If it were me, with comrades harmed and witnessing the plight of those civilians,
I certainly wouldn't be as rational as she is…
I can quite understand Samantha's feelings…
The thing that you feel painful but have to do...
is probably like not wanting to take a bath but being forced to anyway.
...You really need to take a bath.
If I were Miguel from that space, I wonder if I could have survived to this day…
Probably starved to death by now.
If it were you, do you think you could live in such disgrace?
Only those who are pushed to their limits would know the answer to this question.
Did you see the betrayal of Miguel?
Hmph, I foresaw this.
Humans, oh humans, why do you always disappoint me?
So... should I apologize on behalf of humanity?
It's quite refreshing to see the knights play house, especially that young female Paladin.
Wanna bet?
What price will Gloria ultimately pay for the title of Paladin…
Teadon really is like a father to Gloria…
Always thinking about her.
But such protection will come to an end one day.
It seems the story of this space is nearing its end.
What do you think the ending will be like?
Gloria and Teadon, who will give up their own ideas?
Maybe... there's a third possibility.
Hey, between you and me, no thanks are needed!
If you need help, come find me again.
Don't get me wrong, I'm not trying to curry favor…
It's just that these things are of no use to me.
In the future, if the leader needs anything, just let me know first.
Whether it's cat food or balls of yarn, I've got it all here!
Hmm… this is the best stuff I'm willing to part with!
Why, you… Don't you dare call my stuff junk!
Everything has its own value, even if it doesn't meet your expectations…
Take this; it's what you deserve.
Hmm, it's nothing extraordinary indeed…
If you don't need it, just throw it away... if you're not afraid of being sawed in half, that is.
Vlderians are known for their gratitude.
If there's anything you need... just let me know.
I really enjoy life in Elysium…
Leader, I hope I can be of help to you here.
Don't doubt my intentions. This... is not some kind of dangerous item.
Heh, you guessed it.
Col doesn't know... what's the use of these?
Hmm... why don't we go ask the little kitten together?
Never mind, even though there's nothing of value…
But it might turn out to be very useful, hahaha.
Thank you for your trust and support…
I hope you like the little gift I've prepared for you…
I am deeply grateful to be able to offer my humble assistance to you.
My friend, I'm truly grateful for your assistance.
I hope you like my way of showing friendship.
The faint starlight converges to create a distinctive galaxy.
Hope this modest token of appreciation can lend you a hand.
Sascha... is gone. Take it all…
These things... I have no use for them…
Every blessing in this world is the guidance of Radiant.
I appreciate the comfort and help you've given in the past.
Stop fussing; just make do with these things for now.
Hahaha, I've prepared something you'll find useful.
Rest assured! Even if you need a hundred, I'll collect them for you!
It's a gift that I've handpicked to suit you.
Use it when it's needed; that's how to maximize its value.
Well, I do have a knack for giving gifts!
Back then, the dance troupe was adrift in a foreign land, all in need of an uplifting surprise to boost morale.
Never underestimate the insignificant, for once they band together…
It could also become a power that changes the future!
Please forgive me, young one. I don't have any valuable gifts to offer you.
Hmm... I'm glad you like it.
Hmm... if it could always be like this... that would be wonderful…
I hope this thing can be of help to you.
You really are open to all comers, "Leader."
Hmph, I suppose you wouldn't be so easily... swayed by my feigned friendliness, would you?
Preparing these things... is to meet your expectations.
Oh, don't be too disappointed.
Receiving these, would you... be happy?
Ah... it's nothing... I wasn't saying anything…
As per your instructions, I've prepared these.
I will continue to hone myself, awaiting your next directive.
You've seen Taair's past too, haven't you?
With no one to confide in and only books to alleviate the loneliness, he is truly a strong person.
That guy, Faycal... really ought to learn from others' spirits!
Every time he's supposed to read, he feigns illness to escape!
Seeing Taair's companion, I'm also considering getting a bird…
We can play with yarn balls and even play "Cat Catches Bird" games!
Cat catches bird... I think you should ask the bird how it feels about that.
Such a fun game, of course it'd love to play!
So, Taair was inspired after hearing the stories of those miners?
The spark always ignites in the most inconspicuous places.
Only those who have lost everything... can be so fearless, I suppose.
It seems the Fool's Journey has advanced another step.
Ready? Return your Tarot to the Astrarium,
only then will a new Beacon light up in front of you.
This spot is pretty secluded, perfect for a game of hide and seek!
Where's the safest place? Let me scope it out…
Oh, right there! Hide there, and no one will find me!
Oh! The newcomer looks so familiar. Have we met somewhere before?
Hmm… Mhm… Oh! I got it—
They look like my new research subjects!
Those guys didn't lie; the new pet is quite cute, apart from its temper!
Hmm... it's just that I often forget to feed…
Let's invent an automatic feeder!
One, two… Oh no! Why do I have so little candy left!
Easy there. Let me think this through.
One to Leader, one to Maitha... um, I forgot who else…
Ah well, forget it. Let's share it. I'm not being stingy!
This place is way more fun than anywhere I've been before!
If any baddies dare cause trouble here, I'll be the first to step up and teach them a lesson!
It's rare to find a land that truly deserves the words "peace and joy."
It's just a pity…
Back then, I didn't... let Iria become such a place.
In a society where people live in harmony and unity without the need for strict systems and laws,
your leadership is indeed commendable…
Attempting to master your own fate, even to change the world?
Hmph, quite a naive ideal indeed.
But... I must say, I admire your courage.
The Sea of Chaos often reminds me of Iria under the scourge of war.
It's just as desolate, dark, and lifeless here.
When one indulges in comfort, it's easy to overlook the dangers that loom…
After all, you are the Commander of Elysium…
You should understand this better than anyone else.
...Each of you is wearing an idiotic smile on your face…
Hmph, looks like there's not much difference between this place and the Grand Sanctuary!
Elysium, another place teeming with fools.
Because the flowers are beautiful enough, the sun gives them extra attention.
When the day comes that I too become strong and dazzling…
My sun... will surely favor me too!
Rustic furniture and lifeless plants…
The decor and furnishings of this room... they're pretty standard.
But... it kind of feels like home…
I've heard many are terrified of the monsters in the Sea of Chaos…
Hmph, those who lack a firm step deserve to be swallowed by the raging tides!
Ah... Paying so much attention to me... Wanna be my friend?
Knowing who is the partner you need…
Oh my... It seems... you're quite clever.
In the past... our Vlderians only hoped to find such an Elysium…
On that land, we won't have to suffer oppression and torment anymore…
But in the end... we didn't find any…
Although my tribespeople always call me the bravest warrior of the tribe,
actually, compared to Nono…
I lack the courage to change the status quo.
Leader, what goes through the mind of a seafarer when they leave home?
It's nothing... I just remembered the night our sisterhood was torn apart.
I wonder if Nono felt scared at that time...
That guy, he's challenged me countless times already…
The green-haired kid is still sore about losing to me.
Heh... At least the trials up to this point have shown...
that the kid's archery skills have improved a bit.
In the past, Vlderians were traded like cattle and subjected to arbitrary bullying…
It turns out it's because we possess the qualities of gentleness and diligence…
It's just that at that time... we didn't have enough power to protect ourselves.
Dwelling on the past is not befitting of a knight.
Now that you've come to Elysium, you should take up the responsibility and arm yourself…
Eliminate the threat we're about to face.
Leader... you always encourage me when I'm lost.
You also give me the courage to keep moving forward…
Thank you…
Has your recent voyage been smooth?
Those Calamities that threaten Elysium—their strength is not to be underestimated, right?
Hmm, as your comrade-in-arms, I'll definitely fight alongside you!
Compared to the strict regime of the Union, life in Elysium is indeed much more comfortable.
If you ask me what I love most about Elysium…
What attracts me the most... is still the wonderful aroma of food wafting from the kitchen.
This place always reminds me of my past life in the Town of Convallaria.
At the tavern in the town, everyone gathered around…
looking past the differences of our identities and factions and sharing our innermost thoughts.
The cats here are so impressive!
Col can understand what the cat says!
Hmm... Col is so impressive!
But... the impressive Col... still can't kiss the kitten…
Eyebrows, furrowed... that's anger.
Col has seen it; Miguel does it and many people do…
Hmm... at times like this, Col needs to be good, obedient, and cause no trouble…
Can there really be two Cols in the world?
So... will there be a mask like Col's?
Will he encounter Miguel just like Col did?
Col doesn't understand, but Col hopes... the other Col can be happy too.
You going for a swim? Hmm... Can you take Col with you?
The little kitten says... what it likes is in that sea.
Col... Col wants to find that.
Col's dagger... does not work…
There... are a lot of little yellow flowers growing on top…
Flowers, so cute! But Miguel says they represent... a rusted knife.
Rusted... Col... How can it be fixed…
The transformation and growth of a person can sometimes be lengthy, and sometimes it happens in an instant.
Thank you, Leader…
More often than not, it was you who gave me the courage to change.
Whether it's the Town of Convallaria or this Elysium…
It has become the ideal place to call home under your management…
Leader, you're a leader worthy of everyone's trust!
Remember the first time I arrived in the Town of Convallaria…
I remember... I was always afraid of interacting with others, and I always messed things up…
But everyone still accepts and takes care of me…
Hmm... I think I won't forget those days.
If possible, I'd really like to thank those brave Iria warriors in person…
It's their blood-drenched battle that has brought a glimmer of victory to Iria.
It's their spirit that inspired me when I was lost…
As a Princess, I was always meant to stand firm and fight alongside them!
Whether it's aggression or resistance, sacrifice is always the underlying theme of war.
When will those who wage war understand…
In this game of life and death, there are never any real winners.
Leader, have you been to Mount Velta?
It's a beautiful place…
Hiding in the dense forest, you can hunt a lot of wild beasts…
Sometimes, when Nono is in a good mood, I can even hear the melodious sound of a flute.
I'm really good at scouting with my ears and nose!
Whoosh, it's the sound of the sea breeze.
Rustle, the sound of leaves falling.
Sniff, sniff, that aroma... it's almost mealtime.
Gurgle... Every time I eat my sister's cooking, it gives me diarrhea…
If you don't eat, you'll end up hungry just like now.
Sniff, sniff, Leader, do you have something tasty in your pocket?
Leader, why is the Sea of Chaos both enchanting... and terrifying?
Enchanting yet terrifying... sounds like you're describing my sister…
Hmm... but it probably isn't scarier than my sister…
Changing fate, changing the world... These concepts are too grand for me.
For me... as long as I can protect my home and family,
fulfilling my duty, that is enough!
Ran into you again, good Leader…
That look of yours... still chasing that ridiculous ideal, huh?
Alright, keep dreaming your naive dreams.
Nobody better get in my way!
Burp! Now I can drink to my heart's content!
What are you staring at me for!
Do I have the method to save the world written on my face?
I'd advise you not to get your hopes up too high.
Defy fate…
In the end, it's all for naught.
Col actually seems to like it here.
Alright then, let's leave it at that…
A bunch of folks clamoring to change the world…
really sees themselves as heroes out to save the world.
Fine, you be the heroes, I'll be the most comfortable deadbeat.
In the past, peace was always on everyone's lips, yet it seemed so distant.
What would Iria look like if it were at peace?
Would it be like this Elysium... I truly wish to see it with my own eyes.
Not being accustomed to the absence of horses neighing and swords clashing.
Don't get me wrong, I'm not nostalgic for war…
It's just that I must always be ready.
When Elysium faces threats, there's always someone who will stand up against them.
Leader!
Have you been keeping up with your training lately?!
I'm preparing to set sail!
Don't you let your guard down either!
There are still too few gym facilities in Elysium…
This can't go on…
Ensuring everyone has a strong physique is key to better withstand the Calamities!
Rest assured that I will never take my comfortable life for granted!
Calamities are the greatest threat to Elysium…
And I, as a soldier, must eradicate them to defend our homeland!
I once eagerly anticipated bringing Radiant to the world with my own hands…
But I have also been caught in a vortex due to my own obsessions…
It was your guidance back then that freed me from my confusion…
I feel a mysterious force protecting this place.
Oh Radiant, if your will exists here,
please continue to bless Elysium, this ideal sanctuary.
No matter when, we should always maintain the tranquility within our hearts.
We should not doubt ourselves or forget our original intentions because of others' judgments…
I think... this is the most valuable maxim I've received.
War, plague... Elysium seems to have bid farewell to such suffering.
But people still get hurt…
I hope my healing can still be of help.
I often think of the children at the Sanctuary.
Thinking about their innocent smiles and recalling their simple and sincere wishes…
I hope they grow up to be happy people and bring joy and beauty to others.
May my blessings reach across the Sea of Chaos…
I thought... I would die on the battlefields of Iria,
to fulfill my duty, to end this life…
Elysium was never meant for someone like me.
I have dedicated half my life to Iria…
In my heart, nothing is more important than protecting the nation.
Now, with you young folks fighting ahead…
Maybe it's time for me to kick back a bit.
A lifetime in arms... accustomed to the bloody battlefields…
I'm acutely aware that victory and defeat, life and death, can hinge on a single thought.
I could ask for nothing more than to live peacefully in this sanctuary…
When it comes to combat experience... I won't lose to anyone.
Young one, if there's anything you need my help with…
Then come find me again.
If Faris were still here, maybe we could be like we used to…
Heat up a few pots of wine and play chess until dawn.
My loyalty has long found its place…
But if you wish for my service...
...I will follow your orders.
Living here poses no difficulty for me at all.
Leader, please focus your care to those who need it more.
I understand; her heart has never let go of the Radiant.
No matter where…
As long as she still wants to realize her vision…
I'll always be by her side.
I don't have any desires of my own…
Naturally, there's no need to achieve any particular goal…
After I resolved to protect her, these things lost their importance.
The visage this land presents…
Is it as she envisioned it to be?
If that's the case... she should be satisfied.
Eh? Did you catch me peeking…
It's nothing…
I just want to know if you're off to another adventure?
If possible, could you take me with you...?
My brother... although he has many flaws…
he does give one a sense of security…
No matter the mission, he always puts my safety first.
Mmm... He's a good brother.
Leader, I ate a lot of snacks today! I'm so happy…
Shh... don't tell my brother, or I'll never hear the end of it.
Sister Maitha's cooking skills are really amazing…
If only I had such a gentle sister as well.
Just like sister Maitha said…
You truly are a leader worthy of everyone entrusting their lives to!
I... I am not blushing…
I'll keep working hard... striving to be of help to you, yes!
Lately... I seem to have put on some weight…
But here, I can live happily every day!
Hmm…
Is this... perhaps, also a kind of delightful consequence?
To be able to reunite with Gloria in Elysium, I am already very grateful.
In the future... let me make up for the regret of not fulfilling my duties.
Marching forward for a dream and being filled with determination and vigor,
I should learn more from you as well.
Thanks to your grace…
Now I can spend more time thinking about how to refine my cooking.
I'm honored that everyone enjoys the food I make with all my heart.
The courage to defy fate is not easy to come by.
I hope this old frame of mine still has the chance to serve your ideals.
How far into the past can one sail in the Sea of Chaos?
Is it possible to return to the times when Lord Randall was still charging through the battlefield?
If I could, I'd love to tell him in person…
His daughter... has grown into a knight he can be proud of.
I failed to protect... my daughter…
My daughter... please forgive me…
I won't... give up, arrrghhh!
Fight... Fight!
Eliminate... the enemies…
Please... let me... fight!
Only when I'm sober…
do I realize the trouble I've caused you…
I... will repay the favor you did for me…
Sascha, loves... colorful... flowers…
Let me leave all these... for her…
She'll come back, right...?
Aaargh!—
Please, don't come any closer to me... I…
I am... not worth caring for…
Ballads can soothe the soul and also bring us inspiration…
Just listen quietly and attentively…
Then you can discover the true essence.
The sea will listen in silence... embracing our emotions…
You ask... if I have any troubles? Well…
Actually, just now I... was missing someone who's gone on a long voyage…
I often wonder... if I throw a few bottles into the Sea of Chaos,
where will they drift in this world?
Will these bottles, just like the fate of our Vlderians…
drift without anchor and be destined to sink deep into the ocean's abyss?
Do you want to know how to compose a song?
Musical theory knowledge, lyric-writing skills... Hmm, but these are just the basics.
The most important thing is emotion and resonance.
Without these elements, the music just can't truly be touching.
Unity, trust, friendship... they're all gradually filling this Elysium.
Strange, even though it's a place I've never been…
Yet it moves me so deeply.
Perhaps... it's because of someone's presence!
Only by applying tactics in real combat…
can you truly master the art of tactics.
I'll continue to hold myself to the Hanged Men's standards and train hard.
That black cat…
It shouldn't scratch, right? Lately, Nungal has been…
But I'm not good at dealing with cats…
Please, Leader! Remember to trim the cat's claws on time!
Safiyyah is someone you can really count on.
She has not only the characteristics of a resourceful, calm, and decisive commander,
but also a gentle, delicate side…
Those who don't know her have no right to judge her.
Although I haven't seen Nungal around lately…
But every time I see her…
It seems she's become more talkative and smiley than before…
This is good.
That guy, Faycal, is really…
Always competing with me on training duration.
But no matter what…
He couldn't possibly win against us, trained Hanged Men elites, huh!
"Outsiders"… what's that supposed to mean?
Is it… something extraordinary?
Just spaced out for a bit there…
Are you here to talk to me?
Hmm… that's nice…
Everyone's been nice to me…
But… I still prefer being alone…
Thank you for visiting me… like this…
It feels… nice.
There's a mysterious power… swirling around you.
Warm, pulsing…
Can you tell me what that is?
Beryl says this place is perfect for hide-and-seek… No one will ever find you…
I hope… they never find me.
But seeing you makes me happy…
Fix up Maitha's digs… check.
Grind ten pounds of flour… check.
Help Rawiyah brew wine… check, phew…
No need to worry about me, Leader.
I'm the daughter of a family of craft artists, these tasks are all in a day's work!
You wonder how I stay upbeat?
Well… when I'm feeling low, I dive into sweets.
Makes troubles taste sweeter, you know?
Leader, give it a shot when you're feeling down.
I love watching everyone thrive…
It's like watching the sun rising and the trees sprouting.
Each person with a beaming smile…
It fills me with power!
I think… everyone must strive to take control of their own destiny.
Only then can we forge a cohesive unit.
Leader, what's your take?
Inanna… she's really fond of Convallaria.
The blooming season is when I see her smile the most.
Sometimes, she'd share intriguing Convallaria tales with me.
Maybe we should plant more in the garden here…
How did I even get here?
Is this another dimension? Am I still me?
So many mysteries yet to be unraveled.
But I've got a hunch…
The Sea of Chaos holds secrets beyond what meets the eye…
Why let go of the past and parley with old foes?
Only the weak seek solace in numbers.
Is this tranquil life real?
Or is twisted evil lurking somewhere unknown?
I can't judge easily, but I trust that…
Answers will come in due time.
Everything has its order and laws.
Since I'm here…
I shall heed the call of destiny.
Sense of belonging?
Why must people tether their hearts to a particular group?
Satisfying our needs, fulfilling our duties—shouldn't that suffice?
A new notice about me on the board?!
Ah, it's your challenge, isn't it?
Declaring war on me like this?!
I won't make the same mistake twice! Wait…
"Please Alexei, take care of public property"? Ugh!
Tactical maneuvers and their applications…
100 ways to train soldiers…
The ever-shifting battle formations… Hmm…
Darn it! Can't make heads or tails of this military manual!
I'm truly sorry…
I just wanted to loosen the soil for the flowers in the garden…
But before I knew it, I had uprooted them all…
I adore the nickname you all gave me - Caring Bear!
Frankly, this new name might not sound quite as imposing…
But it represents my companions' affirmation and recognition.
This bolsters my confidence in fostering harmony among us!
Imagining chores as Calamity hunts ignites my vigor.
Only then can I muster all my strength!
To help people complete quests and solve problems!
But lately, why has the call for my aid fallen silent?
Happy Springwish Festival, Leader!
I've got snacks galore, and my brother's not pushing me to train.
If every day were like this festival…
Elysium would be bled dry, probably.
Oh, for real? My bad!
Springwish Festival…
This festive atmosphere brings back memories of the knight's ceremony…
Heh, it's all in the past, let's move on.
Let me treat you to my top-notch dish for all your hard work lately.
It's been ages since I've seen snow…
Sascha loves building snowmen…
Where is the snow… the thickest?
I got a new tune brewing for the festival.
The lyrics are set…
but the vibe's still up in the air.
Should it be breezy? Or perhaps a touch warmer?
Leader, I need your help!
Holidays breed laziness.
I overslept today, gotta make up for the missed training by doubling it!
How about trying a new approach, like helping set up the celebration?
Brilliant idea, I'll get right on it!
It's a tad noisy…
My usual nap spot's taken…
I heard everyone has to showcase a talent at the festival.
Talent, huh…
How about the "can't-find-me" talent… Sounds good?
Oh, Leader, you're inviting me to the Springwish Festival, right?
Well, sort of…
Since it's a festival, there must be loads of meat to prepare… Well…
Just the thought of it gets me excited!
How about we go hunting together?
The more a holiday focuses on etiquette and rituals, the more exhausting it gets.
Yet, festivals in Elysium have no such complicated processes.
Was it Maitha who named it the Springwish Festival?
Yeah, spring's when wishes bloom.
Together, we'll forge Elysium into the dream haven for us all!
That's going to take both you and me working together, right?
Some people go all out every holiday, indulging in wild revelry like there's no tomorrow.
They won't quit till they're out cold, needing help to bed…
I just heard Rawiyah yelling your name, totally sloshed.
I'll go shut her up right now.
I've crafted a new toy!
A gadget that feeds you when you're too busy!
Hmm… I'm thinking of finding a spokesperson for it!
Who'd be perfect?
That Mysterious Cat would probably love to.
No way! I would go bankrupt from food costs!
I'll pass on the festival fuss… Not my scene.
Lutfi and Inanna roped me into this.
I apologize for my siblings being a pain again.
Springwish Festival?
Who needs that dumb festival anyway…
I'd rather steer clear of those clowns.
Back in the day, I always fretted over tribal defense and manpower during festivals.
Now, we can finally celebrate without fear of external threats.
Leader, it's all thanks to you!
Remember how Convallaria blossomed beautifully in the town during the Convallaria Festival?
If we gather a basket of fresh flowers and deck out Elysium's flower houses…
Wouldn't it amplify the festive vibe, Leader?
Miguel made Col new clothes, pants, and shoes…
It's stunning, isn't it?
Festivals are the best, Col loves them!
When will you wear it for everyone to see?
Col's afraid to ruin it… Col wants to keep it with him.
With everyone gathered here… united for one goal.
Thank you for giving us this gorgeous Elysium, ample food…
and a safe haven.
Wishing you endless joy and happiness.
Leader, I caught a fish for the kitchen!
Maitha said that fish is perfect for festivals!
But one's hardly enough, right?
You're right, hmm… Should I go catch a few more in the Sea of Chaos?
Are the fish from the Sea of Chaos edible? Hope they're not toxic…
Care to join me for a few drinks?
What, not in the mood?
I wonder if our goody two-shoes leader will go wild with me.
When we let our guard down, that's when enemies strike.
Rest assured, Leader!
I'll stand watch for the Springwish Festival!
Not even an ant will slip past!
Springwish Festival… truly a name brimming with warmth and hope.
May joy, peace, and love envelop everyone.
That's my sincerest prayer from the bottom of my heart.
Hahaha, want me to join the young ones in the festive revelry?
Go easy on this old timer.
I've lined up an all-night chess match with Teadon.
Happy holidays… Apologies, holiday greetings are not really my forte.
Please don't mind me.
Elysium… Sea of Chaos…
Will the ending here differ from my world's?
Better prepare for destruction, naive Leader, while you still can.
Don't mistake me for one of your own.
Change the world, alter fate… What a joke.
I'll stay in Elysium just to witness your dreams crumble.
Leader, is prying into others' pasts your hobby?
Keep your curious gaze to yourself. Some things are better left unknown.
Do you know the true nature of this Sea of Chaos?
It's a boundless void entwined with endless failure and despair.
Why bother chasing a faint hope when it's easier to embrace it?
Put away your overflowing sympathy, Leader.
Just give the order if you need something done.
To guard our home, we forsake all we hold dear.
One misstep, and we vanish into the abyss, lost to time.
The Hanged Men's lives, a tragic, absurd tale.
Does having privilege above the law mean true freedom?
We, the Hanged Men, born and bound in darkness.
The only freedom we grasp…
Is the freedom to bleed until death.
Nungal and Nergal… My finest among the Hanged Men.
And the kids I've watched grow up.
Once led into the abyss by my own hand, now…
They finally get to embrace ordinary life in this land.
Maitha and Faycal, adopted by… Rawiyah, right?
Funny how, after parting ways, we found common ground on this point.
Hah, who knows if it's coincidence or our conne—
Ahem, never mind…
Is there even an end to the booze in Elysium?
Drunk all day long, carefree and reckless…
Always making others carry her back, such a hassle…
Bang bang bang, clang clang clang!
Level One Iron Pot upgrade, initiate!
Sea of Chaos…
Alas! Life's a chaotic ride, ain't it?
That's pretty much the gist of it, right?
That Mysterious Cat loves to spout cryptic philosophies.
Then the two of you must hit it off well with each other.
Huh? No way! I'm all about practical wisdom!
Totally! Different! Things!
Tales of the past, all washed away by the sea and left behind…
Hmph… I'm not feeling nostalgic or anything.
Gotta lose to make way for new stories, right?
Cocoa's Fantastical Adventure, Chapter One—
Conquer the White Wolf King atop Vltar Mountain!
Conquer… Hmm, this word should make it sound cooler.
To think there exists such a tranquil place in this world.
It's awe-inspiring, yet oddly unsettling.
Everyone taking what they need… Sounds perfect, but it's fragile.
I'm itching to shake things up, maybe open an Elysium shop?
Speaking of which, that cat smells like a cunning merchant.
We're bound to make a great team, hehe.
Yesterday, I saw Mysterious Cat trade a single strand of fur with Col for fish snacks.
Totally unfair deal, yet both seemed happy…
Is this what they call "emotional value"?
Fascinating, a world where money's irrelevant.
But how long can this peace last?
Regardless, I'll help you… for the sake of that child.
She really loves Elysium, and I… No, my preferences don't matter.
What are the Calamities truly after?
Knowing that beats just taking them out.
After all, everyone has their price, even the Calamities.
Lately, that Mysterious Cat's been all over my incense burner.
Always lounges after a rub, wiggling in bliss.
Should I cut down the ingredients or add more?
Handling this puppet censer weapon takes skill.
Slip up in practice, and you'll be in serious trouble.
… Don't even ask about the consequences.
The water's just right—feel free to dive in anytime.
I'll prep and be there soon.
I got a bunch asking to learn body balance tricks lately.
But running a class is just too much hassle for me.
Fine… this'll be the last one.
Come along if you're interested… But be punctual.
Navigating the Sea of Chaos always leaves me on edge.
Thankfully, there are always those who scream at the top of their lungs.
Otherwise, I'd be utterly lost out there.
I'm not exactly a business whiz myself!
Just wish everyone could encounter what they love!
Guess which parrot's taken a shine to you lately?
Though I won't spill the beans.
Elysium still feels too small!
Parrots can't fly far, but they sure eat a lot of cookies and get fat.
Can you believe someone complained about the parrots being too loud? I'm like…
Totally agree!
It's been nonstop chaos ever since they showed up!
I want Elysium to be livelier, like the streets of Hashalaram.
Music, kebabs, icy pomegranate juice, acrobatics, and…
Sorry, I'm just really missing it…
Here, take this little gift. Don't worry, it's not a sales pitch.
I just thought you might find it handy.
Hehe, this token is just a taste of what's to come in our exchange.
Take it, I'll bring something better next time.
Ta-da! A little surprise, fancy it?
In life, friendship outweighs any gift, don't you think?
I brought you something along the way that might catch your fancy.
Check out what the parrots found!
They bickered over it for ages! Stash it quietly before they find out.
The path of the "Bishop of the Papal States" is paved with blood and sacrifice…
Burdened by my sins, I have no right to stand here.
I only wish to start anew and do my best to atone for those sins with my own hands.
In that world, so many are still weathering the slings and arrows of outrageous fortune.
If only there could be a place like Elysium there, perhaps…
… it sounds like a pipe dream,
But there's always someone who clings to that sliver of hope, right?
Did you know that the Papal States once had a flower called the New Moon?
It was the most beautiful flower I had ever seen.
But the last time I saw it bloom…
It was a long, long time ago.
Samantha now steadfastly walks the path she believes in.
She has far exceeded the expectations that I, her mentor, ever had for her.
A calm and deliberate figure who methodically orchestrates tasks.
In this respect, you remind me of an old friend.
But please…
I wonder if I'll ever see him again…
These days, more folks have come to me to learn dancing.
Regardless of skill, everyone looks so joyful when they dance…
Heh… although I'm the one teaching the moves,
it was they who helped me rediscover my passion for dancing…
Which move should I use…
A kick seems a bit rough… while a spin is too delicate…
Though any choreography would be warmly received,
I still aim to present the most flawless dance possible…

Explosives?! There are explosives in this sanctuary?
Explosives? Run! Run for your lives!
A bunch of cowardly fools... If we can't find them, we'll just blow them up!
...Where could it be hidden?
Shameless! Those nobles have taken over the Sanctuary outside the city and are defending it to the last stand.
The faithful have nowhere to go; they might have to return to the Sanctuary in the city...
No, no! We haven't found the explosives yet, what if, what if...
I'm going to interrogate that copycat! Her plans have already endangered innocents, she definitely will—
...Tried, but she still refuses to reveal any clues.
Ah! So stupid! Does she realize how many people she could kill!
If all else fails, we’ll have to resort to “extreme measures”…
No! I won't let you torture him for a confession!
Safiyyah! Are your principles more important than lives?
But will torturing them really get you the truth?!
...What's going on, why is it so noisy?
First... then... finally... that's how it all happened.
Oh, the Sanctuary in the city didn't yield any explosives...?
Rawiyah and Safiyyah, follow me!
Destination... the Sanctuary outside the city.
…I don't get it, the copycat has been locked up in the City Watch, when did the explosives get transferred?
The explosives weren't moved; they were hidden in the Sanctuary outside the city from the start.
▷Huh? So we really made a mistake...
No, it's precisely because your reasoning was correct that you fell into the copycat's trap.
Nobles are best at seeking benefits and avoiding harm... The copycat knows this very well.
She deliberately used clues to guide us to search the Sanctuary in the city.
The Mobile Squad's presence is enough to cause panic, and those nobles seeking protection,
As she predicted—they would abandon the "dangerous" Sanctuary in the city and gather outside the city.
That place is remote and desolate, rarely visited by people. Creating an explosion there won't harm more innocents.
Hmm... she's a smart and gentle person, you should get to know her.
So... it's a good thing we didn't resort to torture back then, otherwise... sigh...
You wouldn't do that, I know.
Eh? Why? The situation was really urgent back then—
▷But you won't do that.
You might get impatient, you might get impulsive, but in the end, you'll make the right choice because...
You are Rawiyah.
The City Watch just issued a notice for us to arrest a group of thieves.
Huh? Are you kidding me? It's a mess out there right now.
At such a critical moment, they want us to chase after small-time crooks?
No choice, I'll have to complete the Quest quickly to save time.
Sigh, these thieves in Waverun City are endless!
Hey, catching these small-time crooks was a piece of cake!
But Robin still managed to escape...
Robin? Isn't he dead? We saw it with our own eyes!
But we just fought him, didn't we?
A duel? What are you talking about? I didn't see any Robin at all.
All I saw was a sleepyhead dreaming in a chair after completing a quest!
You've been too tired lately, don't push yourself. Come on, let's go back and rest together!
Recently, there have been rumors about “people biting people”? That’s ridiculous, right?
It's true, remember when Heath found those human experiments in the sewers?
I'll never forget the look of despair in that father's eyes.
Any new discoveries?
Multiple incidents of madmen biting in the sewer slums,
People who get bitten will go mad after a while and start attacking others.
Huh? Isn't this the kind of plot you only find in horror novels?!
Luxite particles were detected in the blood of the madman. This is probably not just a ghost story.
I connected the locations of multiple incidents and discovered a deeply hidden basement.
You mean, that mysterious experimental organization… has another lab?
What are we waiting for? Let's go wipe out those beasts!
Aren’t you with the Dockers?! What are you doing here?
We're really not here to cause trouble this time! It's the Black Whale Gang, they've kidnapped several of my brothers!
Is it a gang fight?
You're with the Dockers; why don't you go find Tristan instead of coming to us?
Sigh, we... we left the gang.
Ever since Kota's brothers died from illness... some of us have...
Tch, Tristan? Claims to be all about family, but now, even you guys don't believe in her anymore, do you?
Speak up, where did you take them, and how many did you kidnap?
Follow me!
Are you the two Mobile Squad members who once proved the doctor's innocence?
That outfit... Are you with the Union?!
Pardon me, I am High Knight Oran. I greatly admire your acts of justice.
Stop pretending to talk about Justice.
The Union colluded with nobles to smuggle Luxite, seizing Iria's interests, what do you say?!
I am here to report a corrupt noble of Iria, not to engage in a war of words.
If we can successfully apprehend him, your doubts will naturally be resolved.
Secretly funded by the Papal States, using any means necessary to alienate the Union and Iria.
There are many such nobles in Waverun City.
The one who framed the doctor is also one of them, right?
But the rumor about the Union colluding with Iria's nobles to smuggle Luxite isn't just gossip, right?
A knight must uphold justice, those who break their oaths...
The council will handle it. You two don't need to get involved.
After all, making the Union and Iria suspicious of each other is exactly what some people want to see the most.
Riddle One: Create a dish that makes everyone feel sweet.
Speaking of sweetness… maybe it's about sugar?
I think no matter what the delicacy is, as long as it's made with heart,
it should make those who eat it feel sweet and happy!
During the festival back in the tribe, we always had some delicious candied fruits…
I used to sneak them into my pocket and eat one when I got hungry at night.
Sweet and tasty, it feels like all the day's fatigue melts away after eating it.
So it was you who stole the fruits Nono prepared for the ritual!
So it was Nono who made it?! No wonder it tastes so good, hehe!
Since you miss the tribe's cuisine, why don't you cook with me today?
Huh?
Vlderian festival delicacies, anyone want to try?
Got something tasty? Col is here!
Col, don't eat that…
Wow! Delicious!
Really?
Col never lies! It's tastier than bugs! Hmm…
What a good kid.
Is it really that delicious?! Did sis secretly improve her cooking skills…
Maybe I was wrong about her… In that case, let's all eat together!
Hmm…
Hmm…
Hmm…
Hmm…
Why's everyone gone quiet? Is it too delicious?
Let me try it too.
… Can't… ugh…
… My teeth are stuck!
What are you doing?
Hmm…
Why are your teeth stuck together? Oh… all of you! Hahahahaha!
Ahem, wait for me, I'll go get some dissolving potion from Beryl!
I thought I'd be mute for life. *sob*
What did you add to the candied fruit?
Hmm… an edible gum that helps candied fruits quickly coat with syrup…
Wow! You used a dozen bottles!
Judging by the expressions on everyone's faces, they seem to have realized that this isn't the answer.
Anyway… let's be cautious from now on.
Based on the failure earlier, the key may lie in creating a "sense of sweetness."
Seems like we can start with the symbolic food…
I have a suggestion, since it's the Convallaria Festival, we shouldn't miss out on the Convallaria Cake.
If we could make Convallaria Cake a dish everyone loves…
Doesn't sound easy.
I believe Teadon can do it. He can customize the flavor of Convallaria Cake to everyone's liking.
Master Chef Teadon?
At your service.
Wow, delicious!
Really? Wait… everything tastes good for you!
This Convallaria Cake seems to use a low-sugar recipe; the sweetness is just right.
The aroma of butter and honey is rich and not at all greasy.
What a taste. I can almost feel the atmosphere of the Convallaria Festival in the town.
Right? Such is the power of good food.
Indeed, each flavor has its unique style.
Something strange got mixed into the Convallaria Cake…
Whoa! Could it be a bug…
Bugs are food too!
"I hope that everyone who eats the Convallaria Cake will find peace and happiness."
"At the dock, you can always find someone to watch the stars with you."
"Let's see this through to the end, {玩家昵称}…" Argh… Who wrote this?
"The winds of happiness will always reach Elysium." Eek…
I'm collecting quotes expressing everyone's feelings, and each cake has a note inside.
Maybe if you eat another piece, you'll see what you once said!
… Uh…
Everyone, come and have some Convallaria Cake! I want to see what others have to say!
"I love this place. It's great to be with everyone."
This person feels the same as Col!
Have another Convallaria Cake, {玩家昵称}.
"Hope everyone can be healthy and strong."
"For health! Come on! I'll be waiting near the swings for our night run!"
Let's just forget about this.
Such festivals are very interesting indeed.
All set.
When you get the chance, share some fun stories from the Convallaria Festival in the Town of Convallaria with us, will you?
Ms. Caris…
Yes, I'll share what little I know with you.
Just hang the wind chime and the note on the tree to make a wish.
{玩家昵称}, what kind of wish did you make?
If you say your wish out loud, it won't come true.
Haha, pardon my abruptness.
May your dreams come true, my friend.
What wish did {玩家昵称} make…
A sneak peek wouldn't hurt, surely?
How can I be of help to {玩家昵称}…
Finally, we can open the presents!
Col wants his gift to be the one everyone loves!
What's this?
It's an apron that says… Kitchen Queen?
Huh? This is what I wrote on my wish note earlier!
Then… you can have Col's gift!
Wow, then I'll trade mine with yours!
Is this… a fishing rod?
An ultra-light fishing rod? And bionic bait?!
Looks like the kind of gift Lord Magnus would appreciate.
A cat doll?
Oh, oh! A lifelike cat! Can Col have it?
It's yours.
Let me see what I got… an Elysium Gourmet Voucher?
Haha, I already got the gift I wanted. This food voucher can go to someone who needs it.
Thanks a lot!
Mine is "The History and Legends of the Sea of Chaos," Mr. Taair should find it interesting.
Thanks, the person who prepared these gifts was really thoughtful.
{玩家昵称}, what's your share?
Let me see… Hmm? Hope Luxite?
Exactly what I needed.
Congratulations on finding the "gift that everyone loves."
So it was Hope Luxite, huh? A reasonable but unexpected answer.
A gift everyone loves… Hope Luxite… As expected of Mr. Acambe…
And Mr. Acambe seems to have carefully prepared the gifts to everyone's liking…
There are still so many unopened gifts. I wonder where would the fine wine in my gift come from.
Is it aged ten years or twenty years?
Those who haven't got their gifts, come join us in unwrapping!
Boss, watch out! A Calamity crawled out of the gift box behind you!
Today… I set off fireworks together with everyone…
Toughie, I even added the scent of your favorite food to the fireworks!
With so much of it, it should spread that scent across the entire Sea of Chaos!
If you smell it, don't forget about me.
Tinkle tinkle, can you get Toughie home early?
I promise never to feed it random food again!
Hmm… you got used to fighting in the Sea of Chaos so quickly…
You may be able to make your wish come true… but only if you have the power to do so.
Look forward to it! I'll personally devise a full training program for you!
